mapper.insert: insert into user_acct_tmp_role (code, name, type, memo, status, tenant_sid, corp_sid, sys_prj_sid, unlimited_date_range, effective_start_date, effective_end_date, unlimited_time_range, effective_start_time, effective_end_time, created_by, created_time, updated_time, version_num) values (#{code}, #{name}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{status}, #{tenantSid}, #{corpSid}, #{sysPrjSid}, #{unlimitedDateRangeFlag}, #{effectiveStartDate}, #{effectiveEndDate}, #{unlimitedTimeRangeFlag}, #{effectiveStartTime}, #{effectiveEndTime}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{versionNum})

insert into user_acct_tmp_role (code, name, type, memo, status, tenant_sid, corp_sid, sys_prj_sid, unlimited_date_range, effective_start_date, effective_end_date, unlimited_time_range, effective_start_time, effective_end_time, created_by, created_time, updated_time, version_num) values
(#{item.code}, #{item.name}, #{item.type}, #{item.memo}, #{item.status}, #{item.tenantSid}, #{item.corpSid}, #{item.sysPrjSid}, #{item.unlimitedDateRangeFlag}, #{item.effectiveStartDate}, #{item.effectiveEndDate}, #{item.unlimitedTimeRangeFlag}, #{item.effectiveStartTime}, #{item.effectiveEndTime}, #{item.createdBy}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.updatedTime}, #{item.versionNum})
mapper.update:
update user_acct_tmp_role
version_num = version_num + 1,
code = #{code},
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
memo = #{memo},
status = #{status},
tenant_sid = #{tenantSid},
corp_sid = #{corpSid},
sys_prj_sid = #{sysPrjSid},
unlimited_date_range = #{unlimitedDateRangeFlag},
effective_start_date = #{effectiveStartDate},
effective_end_date = #{effectiveEndDate},
unlimited_time_range = #{unlimitedTimeRangeFlag},
effective_start_time = #{effectiveStartTime},
effective_end_time = #{effectiveEndTime},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
where sid = #{sid} and version_num = #{versionNum}
